htmlContent:
Unplayable as an event if ‘The Iron Lady’ is in effect.

Remove US Influence in Western Europe by a total of 3 Influence points, removing no more than 2 per country.
name: Socialist Governments
plainContent:
Unplayable as an event if ‘The Iron Lady’ is in effect.
Remove US Influence in Western Europe by a total of 3 Influence points, removing no more than 2 per country.
